definitions.definition: An open area in a town housing a public market .
The space, actual or metaphorical, in which a market operates.
examples: Some high-street retailers were slow to enter the new digital marketplace of the Internet.

definitions.definition: The world of commerce and trade .
A place or sphere for the exchange of anything, such as ideas or fashions.

main_definition: An open area in a town housing a public market .
secondary_definitions: The space, actual or metaphorical, in which a market operates.
( by extension ) The world of commerce and trade .
( figurative ) A place or sphere for the exchange of anything, such as ideas or fashions.
